entry.title: Introduction to my portfolio
entry.content:
This is an overview to my portfolio

  • Education : This includes details about my education.
  • Academia : This includes all the academic,national and international duties and responsibilities I’ve held and also various workshops I’ve conducted.
  • Experience: This includes my professional experience as well as special courses and curriculum designed by me.
  • Research: This includes all of my research contributions as an author, reviewer and even editor.
  • About: This is an overview of myself and also various awards and achievements that I’ve received.
entry.summary: This is an overview to my portfolio
